programs.program:
as principal admin password "pass2" do
create principal alice "alices_password"
set x = []
set z = "private"
set delegation x admin write->alice
set delegation x admin read->alice
return "success"
***

as principal alice password "alices_password" do
set i = "info"
append to x with i
foreach y in x replacewith {f1=i,f2=z}
return x
